I think this instruction may help a bit more

INSTALL NOTES

1. Unpack the release
2. Mount or burn image
3. Install (use key info when asked - can be found in ADDITIONAL NOTES)
4. Run the AS_OMSI_UPD_V101.exe  file from UPDATE folder on the IMAGE FILE(sr-omsi.iso) (use same key info)
5. Copy all files from the SKIDROW folder from the IMAGE FILE.
(Paste these files to the folder in Program Files\m-r-software )
6.Create a short cut of the omsi.exe in your desktop
5. Play the game
6. Support the companies, which software you actually enjoy!


ADDITIONAL NOTES

During install, use this to be able to install:

Customer...........: aca882k9@hotmail.com
Serial.............: 6bH0tLrl4eXrvODvscSt67jpte26qrTr

Remember - Don't use the Aerosoft launcher to start the game!
